php.java.script
Class PhpSimpleHttpScriptContext

java.lang.Object
  javax.script.SimpleScriptContext
      php.java.script.PhpSimpleHttpScriptContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScriptContext, Invocable, IPhpScriptContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
PhpFacesScriptContext
public class PhpSimpleHttpScriptContext
extends SimpleScriptContext
implements IPhpScriptContext

A simple ScriptContext which can be used in servlet environments.

Author:
jostb
